title: Bill Hinchman back and oddity mini-run for sale or trade
author: Luke

posts.post_title: Bill Hinchman back and oddity mini-run for sale or trade
posts.post_content:
Hey guys,

I have three tough Hinchmans here:

-Semi-colon 
-EPDG
-Old Mill

Here's the population reports for EPDG and OM:
EPDG: 11 total  (4 at PSA and 7 at SGC)
Old Mill:  10 total (5 at PSA and 5 at SGC)

I'm not sure how scarce the semi-colon variation is, but you don't see them often.  Once you get these 3 cards, you just need the Hindu (there are 10 Hindus graded between PSA and SGC) and all the other easy backs.  Could be a pretty fun project for someone.

I'm looking for $200 via PP f/f or HOFers in trade.  Shoot me a PM if interested.  Thanks!
